text: The Tomb of prophet Noah () or Noah's Mausoleum is a mausoleum in the city of Nakhchivan, Azerbaijan. Architecture of the construction is dated from the 8th century. ==Gallery== Image:Noah's tomb.jpg|Postcard of the Russian Empire Image:Noah's tomb in Nakhchivan.jpg|Postcard of the Russian Empire Image:Noah's tomb. Kengerli.jpg|Mausoleum in the portrait by Behruz Kangarli, the early 20th century Image:Stamps of Azerbaijan, 2010-911.jpg|Postage stamp of Azerbaijan, 2010 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Buildings and structures in Azerbaijan Category:8th-century establishments in Asia Category:Tourist attractions in Azerbaijan
title: Noah's Mausoleum
